meta.hint: Antonyms are words with opposite meanings. Example - Happy and Sad, Cold and Hot
meta.question: Identify the sentence with, correct Antonym.

content.word: My cousin used to be a fast swimmer.
content.description:
Which sentence has the opposite meaning?
My cousin used to be a slow swimmer.
content.extra: My cousin used to be a weak swimmer., My cousin used to be a fast swimmer.

content.word: Did you open the jar of strawberry jam?
content.description:
Which sentence has the opposite meaning?
Did you close the jar of strawberry jam?
content.extra: Did you open the jar of strawberry jam?, Did you break the jar of strawberry jam?

content.word: Dylan always rides his bike to school.
content.description:
Which sentence has the opposite meaning?
Dylan never rides his bike to school.
content.extra: Dylan always rides his bike to school., Dylan quickly rides his bike to school.

content.word: This pillow is too soft for me.
content.description:
Which sentence has the opposite meaning?
This pillow is too hard for me.
content.extra: This pillow is too big for me., This pillow is too soft for me.

content.word: Did Dad buy the bike at the car boot sale?
content.description:
Which sentence has the opposite meaning?
Did Dad sell the bike at the car boot sale?
content.extra: Did Dad buy the bike at the car boot sale?, Did Dad use the bike at the car boot sale?
